column4: adama: please do not swear in this channel if you want a package that works make it your self the ubuntu packages are done slightly differently at times by maintainers to help normal users
package that works? are you being stupid? this is a package from stable, that broke together with the newest kernel+fixes that was pushes into the repos today
if you don't like the way a package is made make your own or try a different repo... (perhaps unofficial or go and use debian)
what package ?
great standard-answer, do you have any other standard-answers you would like to copy'n'paste to me? :P
going to tell me which package ?... oh the rt kernel broke ?
install the generic one and then you will have a failsafe
i f... can't install anything, due to the way apt works.
paste coming up.
http://pastebin.com/d1a4c9915
you don't need to tell me how a system works, thanks.
got a boot partition ?
yes, and it's mounted..
it says its full ... i hope you are aware of the problem that gives you
... so it can't remove the package, because it's full? that sounds.. wrong :-)
i know
free up some space --- why do you want to even remove that kernel in the first place
i DID free up plenty of space.
i did believe you, i fixed the problem, and dpkg STILL is fubar.
doesn't want to break his system because he is being some what difficult
